dialogue: ...And those are the four things I need you to ask our VP of marketing.
Maybe you should write them down.
You have a lot on your mind. A little note might be a good idea.
How hard is it to remember three things?
Four things! There are four questions!
Right, right. There's the one about the battery, and the other two.
There are four questions! Four, four, four!!! And none of them are about a battery!
Should the new software have a battery?
